description: Electrical Work on the CCGS Des Groseilliers including Design, manufacture and installation of a shore power supply panel with phase selection and Engineering and installation of infrared windows for thermographic readings located in Quebec, Canada
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==========================================================

### Tender Information

*   **Title**: F3065-221678 - Electrical Work on the CCGS Des Groseilliers
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3646314643
*   **Publication Date**: September 1, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: September 22, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 13, 2022
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2024

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the acquisition of Electrical Work on the CCGS Des Groseilliers. The scope of work includes:

*   Design, manufacture, and installation of a shore power supply panel with phase selection
*   Engineering and installation of infrared windows for thermographic readings

The completed project is located in Quebec, Canada.

### Eligibility and Requirements

This procurement is open to all qualified contractors. The Contractor must provide a bid that includes all required supporting documentation.

### Important Notice

Please note that the closing time for this tender has been extended. Required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted no later than 2:00 PM EDT on September 22, 2022. Any submissions received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

*   Contracting Agency: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contracting Agency Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Contact Person: Gabriel Piras (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Contact Email: [gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### More Information

Additional information regarding this tender may be found on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13992209?extsite=MTM5OTIyMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13992209?extsite=MTM5OTIyMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)(Block)
